snippet: The report on the shooting of Maj. Gen. Harold J. Greene by an Afghan soldier praised the rapid response by other forces, but said Afghan officials did not cooperate fully in the inquiry.
abstract: Pentagon releases report on investigation into death of Maj Gen Harold J Greene, first American general killed in Afghanistan, criticizing Afghan officials for not cooperating; findings confirm gunman, an Afghan Army private named Rafiqullah, had not acted on behalf of Taliban.
lead_paragraph: The report on the shooting of Maj. Gen. Harold J. Greene by an Afghan soldier praised the rapid response by other forces, but said Afghan officials did not cooperate fully in the inquiry.

headline.main: Pentagon Issues Report on Killing of American General in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Issues Report on Killing of General
